title: Google\Cloud\Bigtable\Filter\Builder\KeyFilter
name: KeyFilter
description: A builder used to configure row key related filters.

methods.name: regex
methods.description: Matches only cells from rows whose keys satisfy the given RE2 regex. In other words, passes through the entire row when the key matches, and otherwise produces an empty row. Note that, since row keys can contain arbitrary bytes, the \C escape sequence must be used if a true wildcard is desired. The . character will not match the new line character \n, which may be present in a binary key.

methods.name: exactMatch
methods.description: Matches only cells from rows whose keys equal the value. In other words, passes through the entire row when the key matches, and otherwise produces an empty row.

exceptions.description:
When the provided value is not an array
        or string.

methods.name: sample
methods.description: Matches all cells from a row with probability, and matches no cells from the row with probability 1-probability.

params.name: probability
params.description: The probability to filter by. Must be within the range [0, 1], end points excluded.

exceptions.description:
When the probability does not fall
        within the acceptable range.
